channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Bitcoin addresses holding 1 BTC or more reach one million: Glassnode
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Convicted buyers have bought up cheap Bitcoin as prices fell over the course of last year.

item.title: SEC revises $22M punishment against LBRY, seeks $111K instead
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The SEC originally wanted LBRY to pay millions of dollars in penalties, but now concedes the defunct firm can’t pay up that amount.

item.title: Bitcoin price hits $27.2K, but new analysis warns more losses 'likely'
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin may be up 7.5% since May 12, but BTC price action is not giving everyone cause for positivity.

item.title: Bitcoin’s recovery may trigger buying in these 4 altcoins
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: While most coins are reeling under pressure, Bitcoin and select altcoins such as ADA, ATOM, LDO, and ARB are showing promise.

item.title: 4 alarming charts for Bitcoin bulls as $27K becomes formidable hurdle
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: The price of Bitcoin can fall to $15,000 in 2023 if its strengthening correlation with certain macro charts is any indication.

item.title: Can memecoins be used as real currency?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jagjit Singh
item.description: Memecoins can be used as a form of currency, although their acceptance and stability may vary.

item.title: ‘Significant risk’ of US Treasury running ‘out of funds’ soon: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: The United States Congressional Budget Office has predicted that the U.S. government’s annual deficits will “nearly double over the next decade.”

item.title: BTC miner Rhodium faces lawsuit over alleged $26M in unpaid fees: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Crypto mining firm Riot Platforms is seeking to terminate “certain hosting agreements” with Rhodium Enterprises and be relieved of refunding any outstanding power credits.

item.title: Coinbase screws up, Florida bans CBDCs, and Ordinals face controversy: Hodler’s Digest, May 7-13
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Editorial Staff
item.description: Calls for a boycott of Coinbase over memecoin controversy, Florida’s ban on CBDCs, and the effects of Bitcoin Ordinals on the BTC network.

item.title: Ethereum’s Beacon Chain updated after finality issues
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Ethereum core developers released patches for Prysm Labs and Teku clients in response to a Beacon Chain issue preventing block finalization.

item.title: Jump Trading faces lawsuit over alleged $1.3B profit from TerraUSD
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Jump Trading and its CEO, Kanav Kariya, are accused of violating United States regulations and unjust enrichment in the lawsuit.

item.title: Ordinals and BRC-20 will disappear in a matter of months, says JAN3 CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marco Castrovilli
item.description: The hype around Bitcoin Ordinals and BRC-20 tokens is unsustainable and will fade away in a matter of months, according to JAN3 CEO Samson Mow.

item.title: Crypto Biz: Ripple’s expensive battle, Bittrex bankruptcy and a new blockchain network
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz explores Arbitrum’s latest proposal, Ripple’s two-year battle with the SEC and a large corporations’ coalition to build blockchain solutions for institutional investors.

item.title: BTC price bounces at $25.8K lows amid warning over low whale interest
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin traders line up “safe” support levels, but order book data makes one observer uneasy about the future.

item.title: How to build an emergency fund using budgeting apps
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Guneet Kaur
item.description: Track your expenses and savings goals using budgeting apps to build your emergency fund.

item.title: QuadrigaCX creditors set to receive 13% of their claims as an ‘interim dividend’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The creditors will receive a monetary equivalent of the value of their lost crypto assets as of April 15, 2019.

item.title: Nifty News: Assassin’s Creed unveils ‘smart collectibles,’ MechaFightClub winds down and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: NFT game MechaFightClub is shutting down due to regulatory uncertainty in the U.S., while Yuga Lab’s new CEO has snapped up a BAYC NFT for well over the floor price.

item.title: Bakkt delists majority of tokens from recently acquired Apex Crypto platform
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The delisting included major tokens used in DeFi, with the company saying it was following “up-to-date regulatory guidance.”

item.title: US lawmakers target perceived risks of crypto adoption in El Salvador with reintroduced bill
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The legislation appeared to be another attempt at the Accountability for Cryptocurrency in El Salvador Act, originally introduced after the country’s Bitcoin Law was enacted.

item.title: Binance calls it quits in Canada, blames new rules
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Binance is the latest in a string of departures from CEO Changpeng Zhao’s home country, but it promises to keep working with regulators.

item.title: LG Electronics files patent for NFT-trading TV
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The information was published on WIPO’s global database for intellectual property on May 11, 18 months after LG filed its application.

item.title: Coinbase establishes advisory council with former US lawmakers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Former Senator Patrick Toomey, former Representative Tim Ryan, former Representative Sean Patrick Maloney, and others will advise Coinbase on crypto policies.

item.title: How will lower interest rates benefit Bitcoin?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Cointelegraph analyst and writer Marcel Pechman explains how lowering the interest rates in the U.S. will ultimately benefit Bitcoin and the cryptocurrency market.

item.title: The US should promote USDC — before it's too late
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alex O’Donnell
item.description: USDC brings stability to cryptocurrency. It would behoove the financial system if policymakers took measures to foster its adoption.

item.title: BitDAO proposes to replace BIT token in branding revamp
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: After community approval, BIT holders will undergo a token-conversion process for the new Mantle token. Governance and treasury management will remain unchanged.

item.title: MakerDAO publishes 5-phase roadmap featuring funding for open-source AI projects
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: DAI stablecoin proprietor MakerDAO offered up an AI-heavy roadmap for the future with plans for a new blockchain.

item.title: President Biden announces nominations for key positions at Federal Reserve
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Leadership at the Fed will likely have an impact on how the U.S. government handles the potential issuance of a central bank digital currency.

item.title: Price analysis 5/12: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and most major altcoins are slumping, but the charts suggest that a recovery could be around the corner.

item.title: Florida governor signs CBDC bill into law, restricting some uses of US and foreign CBDCs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The new law, signed by Governor Ron DeSantis, also urges other states to take action against the potential introduction of CBDCs through their commercial codes.

item.title: NBCUniversal veteran will replace Elon Musk as Twitter CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Elon Musk announced his departure as Twitter CEO on May 11, suggesting his replacement would be a woman who would take over within roughly six weeks.
